mdRecord.dcterms:description: Final conditions of sale of Short's land to Higginbotham; describes the national trend toward the household manufacture of "coarse" clothing rather than importing it from Britain; describes his manufacturing process. Brief description of method of "clothing my laborers" through plantation manufacture of items.
